The magistrate's infant daughter Ah Ying (Joey Wang) is betrothed to the Wu Feng Yun. A newlywed husband Martial infant and a half months, to return home to visit Edie magistrate. Lovers in a tree halfway lots of rest. The rest, they never stepped into Edie's county threshold.
movies.simplePlot: Yuan, Chonglu door magistrate's wife to the husband, because of sexual desire and dissatisfaction with the people of adultery, after being found was "riding wooden donkey" lethal torture. ...

biography.bio: Joey Wang grew up in her native Taiwan, where she was spotted by a talent scout for a modeling agency. Her height and delicate beauty made her one of the most popular Taiwanese models, and Wang went on to have a successful film career. Her ethereal elegance was used to great effect by director Ching Siu-tung in A Chinese Ghost Story (1987) and its sequels. Wang has also appeared in dozens of contemporary feature films, including 'God of Gamblers' starring Chow Yun-Fat, and 'City Hunter' opposite Jackie Chan.
biography.name: Joey Wang

biography.bio: Lap-Man Tan is an actor, known for Niki Larson (1993), The Silent War (2012) and Exodus (2007).
biography.name: Lap-Man Tan

biography.bio: Anthony Yiu-Ming Wong was born on June 16, 1962 in Hong Kong.
biography.name: Anthony Yiu-Ming Wong

biography.bio: Wing-Chi Chan is an actress, known for Shuai pi gui (1992), Jing ji xing you xi (1993) and Feng liu jia zu (1992).
biography.name: Wing-Chi Chan

biography.bio: Hui Lou Chen was born on January 20, 1929 in Shanghai, China. He is known for his work on La hyène intrépide (1979), Fearless Hyena 2 (1983) and Raining in the Mountain (1979).
biography.name: Hui Lou Chen

biography.bio: Shu-Fang Chen was born on July 2, 1939 in Taiwan. She is an actress, known for His Matrimony (1985), The Smiling Starlight (2012) and Sha Fu (1986).
biography.name: Shu-Fang Chen

biography.bio: Ben Ko Chu is an actor, known for Island of Fire (1990), Butterfly and Sword (1993) and Xia gu ying xiong zhuan (1980).
biography.name: Ben Ko Chu

biography.bio: Biu Gam is an actor and assistant director, known for Mad Mission (1982), Last Hero in China (1993) and Hua jie shi dai (1985).
biography.name: Biu Gam

biography.bio: It looks like we don't have any Biography for Hsiu-ling Huang yet.
biography.name: Hsiu-ling Huang

biography.bio: It looks like we don't have any Biography for Yi-Chun Hung yet.
biography.name: Yi-Chun Hung

biography.bio: Jack Kao was born on April 23, 1958 in Taiwan. He is an actor and writer, known for Millennium Mambo (2001), La cité des douleurs (1989) and Unbeatable (2013).
biography.name: Jack Kao

biography.bio: I-Chen Ko was born in 1946 in Taiwan. He is an actor and director, known for Life of Pi (2012), Ending Cut (2009) and Histoire de Taipei (1985).
biography.name: I-Chen Ko

biography.bio: Chung Lin is an actor, known for Une balle dans la tête (1990), A Better Tomorrow II (1987) and Dream Lovers (1986).
biography.name: Chung Lin

biography.bio: Ting Gou Meng is known for his work on Broken House (1976), Mao ling (1980) and Liu san san (1979).
biography.name: Ting Gou Meng

biography.bio: No stranger to the international spotlight acting in period martial arts films with the likes of King Hu, Li Han Hsiang, Ting Shan Hsi and Joseph Kuo with credits spanning from the 60s through the early 80s, imposing and distinctive veteran Taiwanese character actor Mao Tien remained busy through the New Millennium most notably working with award winning Taiwan New Wave director Tsai Ming Lang in memorable yet devastating interior performances in 'Rebels of the Neon God', 'The River' and 'What Time is it There?' renewing his prominence and stature with international audiences, popular and art-house fare alike.
biography.name: Tien Miao
